title: Planispheric Astrolabe (14th century, Einbeck)
description: A planispheric astrolabe consisting of a mater, rete, ruler, alidade, and a pin and wedge holding the elements together. The rete design uses a four-leaf clover motif supporting the equator and ecliptic. The physical object is held at the Jagiellonian University Museum (Collegium Maius, Kraków, Poland).
primarySource: Jagiellonian University Museum (Collegium Maius), Kraków, Poland
